author: djrtwo
content: The research group's methodology is fundamentally flawed

author: djrtwo
content: They assume that 1 validator equates to 1 node, whereas 1 validator in the becon chain protocol just represents 32 eth in the consensus

author: djrtwo
content: and many validators are often run on a single node

author: djrtwo
content: through empirical analysis, we see something like 3k to 4k nodes on the network

author: djrtwo
content: rather then 200k+ nodes as they write in their paper...
